definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Fa3 yuan4

sentences.english: It was easily good enough for pole so that was the main thing.
sentences.chinese: 那一圈跑得不錯，足以使我獲得杆位，那是最主要的。

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出產性活動己的總稱能夠舉行。

sentences.english: Garden Cottages are a favorite of brides for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 花園的別墅是他們的新婚之夜新娘最喜愛的一種。

sentences.english: Corneal ulcers occur most often in patients who use extended-wear soft contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 角膜潰瘍最常發生於長期使用軟性角膜接觸鏡的病人。

sentences.english: It is one of the famous paintings in the ancient Eygptian history.
sentences.chinese: 這是古老的埃及史上最著名的油畫之一。

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她們都穿着最昂貴的衣服，留着長長的美麗的鬈髮。

sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 許多最基本的職場失誤會讓他們摔跟頭，這讓我困惑。

sentences.english: It turns out Jialing is one of the oldest and largest motorcycle manufacturers in its home country.
sentences.chinese: 嘉陵是中國最古老也是最大的摩托車生產商之一。

sentences.english: The two most common types of igneous rocks are granite and basalt.
sentences.chinese: 兩種最普遍的火成岩是花崗岩和玄武岩。

sentences.english: The garbage collection pause times are the most significant delays any threads encounter.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾收集停頓時間是任何線程遇到的最顯著的延遲。

sentences.english: I strongly believe that Japanese high school girls are the sexiest female living creature in this world.
sentences.chinese: 我深信日本女子高生是世上最性感的雌性生物。

sentences.english: My most abstruse class was Advanced Calculus Mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 最深邃難明的課非微積分莫屬。

sentences.english: Heartless laugh, was the best thing that I have.
sentences.chinese: 隃罏沒心沒肺的笑，是我擁有的最美好的東西。

sentences.english: Man is the only creature that consumes without producing.
sentences.chinese: 人是一種最可憐的傢伙，什麼都產不了，只會揮霍。

sentences.english: But i heard you are the best.
sentences.chinese: 在某個領域裏最優秀，卻又不以此自矜。

sentences.english: She put the medicine on the top shelf beyond the reach of her son .
sentences.chinese: 她把藥放在了兒子夠不着的最上面的架子上。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
